message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I understand your position, but $11500 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and I offer you the product for $12750? This price is fair considering the value of the product to both of us.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward.
I'm not sure $12750 is a fair split of the difference. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $12500. That's the highest I'm willing to pay.
